title: Liverpool transfer news and rumours: Luan and Thomas Lemar
description: All the latest Liverpool transfer news and rumours from across the British and European press on Wednesday, January 24.
content: Liverpool have been linked with a move for Gremio's Luan, but the Liverpool Echo say the Reds are "categorically not in talks" to sign the 24-year-old.A report on Yahoo Sports has claimed Jurgen Klopp is a big fan of the Brazilian, who was named player of the tournament at the 2017 Copa Libertadores.But the Echo say there is no truth in the suggestions that there have been discussions for the forward.Also reported by Yahoo is that Liverpool have an agreement in place with Thomas Lemar.However, it is said the Reds have refused to meet Monaco's asking price of at least 100m euros.Spanish newspaper Sport claim Roma are interested in Liverpool striker Daniel Sturridge.It is reported the Serie A side are looking at either Sturridge or Gerard Deulofeu this month.
